https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gMEIe8EnGQeXL1y0tcWyIrN5CgH.jpg On her 16th birthday, Asagiri Kanna, a shy and bullied girl is abducted and taken to attend a new school. There she finds out she has been promised to marry the demon king, Kaki Kitou. Neither of them seem to be happy about it. Battle of Demons
